error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
contextualTypeOnYield2.ts(1,30): error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Generator'.
contextualTypeOnYield2.ts(3,13): error TS7006: Parameter 'num' implicitly has an 'any' type.
contextualTypeOnYield2.ts(3,21): error TS2584: Cannot find name 'console'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to include 'dom'.

==== contextualTypeOnYield2.ts (3 errors) ====
    type OrGen = () => (number | Generator<string, (arg: number) => void, undefined>);
                                 ~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Generator'.
    const g: OrGen = function* () {
        return (num) => console.log(num);
                ~~~
!!! error TS7006: Parameter 'num' implicitly has an 'any' type.
                        ~~~~~~~
